title: ISic000048. Dedication to Isis and Serapis by Caius Ennius Secundus
body:
1Serapi · Isi · sacrum
2C(aius) · Ennius · Secundus
3votum · a(nimo?) · p(io?)

1SERAPIISISACRUM
2CENNIUSSECUNDUS
3VOTUMAP

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text of Mommsen;
  • 3: expansion first proposed by Schoene

translation

Sacred to Serapis and Isis, Caius Ennius Secundus (fulfilled) his vow with a dutiful spirit

commentary

bibliography
